name: sort-json-array
description: Sorts JSON/JS arrays by value, object property or custom function

commands.title: Sort JSON/JS array ascending
commands.enablement: editorLangId == json || editorLangId == jsonc || editorLangId == jsonl || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == dart || editorLangId == coffeescript

commands.title: Sort JSON/JS array descending
commands.enablement: editorLangId == json || editorLangId == jsonc || editorLangId == jsonl || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == dart || editorLangId == coffeescript

commands.title: Sort JSON/JS array custom
commands.enablement: editorLangId == json || editorLangId == jsonc || editorLangId == jsonl || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == dart || editorLangId == coffeescript

sortJsonArray.collation.locales.description: Which locale to use for sorting. The sort order for characters such as รถ is different in some languages (for example Swedish and German). Leave empty to use system default

sortJsonArray.collation.caseFirst.description: Whether upper case or lower case should sort first

sortJsonArray.collation.ignorePunctuatio.description: Whether punctuation should be ignored, such that b <  "b" < c

sortJsonArray.collation.numeric.description: Whether numeric collation should be used, such that "1" < "2" < "10"
